description:
They'd like to introduce you to your new go-to spring sweater. Delivering the perfect amount of transitional warmth their men's Spring Creek Sweater takes you from winter through spring with ease.

Take a second look, because thanks to its space dyed fabric (in which a special dyeing technique is used to create a textured pattern), this sweater has depth. And with a convenient pouch pocket big enough to stash all the essentials, you can head out hands free for the day.
name: Prana Spring Creek Sweater, Slim - Mens
